spec_data.Name: perl-CGI-Application-Plugin-ValidateRM
spec_data.Description:
CGI::Application::Plugin::ValidateRM helps to validate web forms when using
the CGI::Application framework and the Data::FormValidator module.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:00:50 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Help validate CGI::Application run modes using Data::FormValidator
